name: Ducky Flap
description:
Ducky Flap was created for Flappy Jam 2014 where the goal was to create a game inspired by the popular title Flappy Bird.  The goal of Ducky Flap is to fly through as many obstacles and obtain the highest score possible.  The game is intended to be simplistic yet difficult.  Good Luck!

If you enjoy this game, please consider buying me a drink by clicking on the Support This Game button! ^o^
